rotate_and_press_knob.description: Rotate and press the knob to adjust the chair's mechanism.

clean_knob_again.description: Clean the chair's knob using a fresh piece of cloth.

press_the_knob.description: Press the knob to adjust the chair's mechanism.

polish_knob.description: Polish the chair's knob for maintenance.

rotate_the_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust the chair's height or reclining angle.

clean_knob.description: Clean the chair's knob using a soft cloth.

rotate_and_press_caster.description: Rotate and press the caster to ensure its mobility.

clean_caster_again.description: Clean the chair's caster with a new cloth to remove any remaining dust or dirt.

press_caster.description: Press the caster to check its elasticity.

polish_caster.description: Polish the chair's caster for smooth movement.

rotate_caster.description: Rotate the caster to ensure its mobility.

clean_caster.description: Clean the chair's caster to remove any dust or dirt.

rotate_caster_clockwise.description: Rotate the chair's caster clockwise for smooth movement

rotate_and_press_wheel.description: Rotate and press the wheel to ensure its function.

clean_wheel_again.description: Clean the wheel of the chair once again to ensure smooth and clean movement.

press_wheel.description: Press the wheel to check its mobility.

polish_wheel.description: Polish the wheel of the chair for smooth rotation.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to ensure its function.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel of the chair to ensure smooth movement.

rotate_wheel_clockwise.description: Rotate the chair's wheel clockwise to ensure its function

rotate_wheel_counterclockwise.description: Rotate the chair's wheel counter clockwise

rotate_and_press_seat.description: Rotate and press the seat to adjust its comfort.

clean_seat_again.description: Clean the seat of the chair again for hygiene purposes.

press_seat.description: Press the seat to check its comfort.

polish_seat.description: Polish the seat of the chair for maintenance and hygiene.

rotate_seat.description: Rotate the seat to adjust its orientation.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat of the chair for hygiene purposes.

rotate_seat_clockwise.description: Rotate the chair's seat clockwise to adjust its orientation

rotate_seat_counterclockwise.description: Rotate the chair's seat counter clockwise to adjust its orientation

clean_chair_leg_again.description: Clean the leg of the chair again to remove the dust or other residuals.

polish_chair_leg.description: Polish the leg of the chair for maintenance.

clean_chair_leg.description: Clean the leg of the chair to remove the dust or other residuals.

clean_chair_leg_dry.description: Clean the chair's leg with a dry cloth

clean_chair_leg_wet.description: Clean the chair's leg with wet cloth

check_and_adjust_chair.description: Check the comfort and adjust the chair by rotating and pressing the knob, caster, wheel and seat.

clean_every_part.description: Clean the entire chair including the knob, caster, wheel, seat and chair leg thoroughly.

check_chair_comfort.description: Check the comfort of the chair by pressing the knob, caster, wheel and seat.

polish_whole_chair.description: Polish the entire chair including the knob, caster, wheel, seat and chair leg for maintenance and hygiene.

adjust_chair.description: Adjust the chair by rotating the knob, caster, wheel and seat.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the knob, caster, wheel, seat and chair leg.

clean_chair_dry.description: Clean entire chair with a dry cloth

clean_chair_wet.description: Clean entire chair with a wet cloth
